attributes.action: not have Gordon Brown, a Scot who has not been elected in England, as his successor.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The English people should be given a choice of Prime Minister for the English Parliament by holding a referendum. The Irish/Welsh/Scottish people have their own Assemblies. Why can't the English? Now Gordon Brown  is even putting a Scot (Adam Smith) on the English £20 notes. He will never support the English.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
